lead_paragraph: LIFF--Wendy. May 3, 1949 - February 27, 2016. She is survived by her husband Sherwin, daughter Joanna, sisters Arlene Cohen, Abby Karasik and Barbara Dippolito, brothers Glenn Gabai and Larry Gabai and numerous nieces and nephews. She had a big heart and will be dearly missed by family and friends. Funeral service will be held Tuesday at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. at 11:30am. 1/3
